name: crsp
body:

    EXEC $SCHEMA$.$NAME$

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE $SCHEMA$.$NAME$ (
)
AS
--WITH ENCRYPTION, SCHEMABINDING, VIEW_METADATA
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON

    $SELECTEDTEXT$$CURSOR$
END
